EmailTemplate.name: Credit Hold
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Your account is currently on Credit Hold which is preventing us from releasing your order.
Please have your Accounts Payable team contact the below credit focal:
<Insert credit analyst contact information here>
If you have any questions, please reply to this email.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
